title: Goal-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing Veterinary-Based Mathematical Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (fractions, ratios, statistics) and foundational veterinary terminology
context.additional_context: For veterinary industry professionals, emphasizing mathematical problem-solving skills applicable to actual work tasks

learning_goals: Ratio and percentage formulas can be accurately applied when calculating animal weight/drug dosage
Veterinary experimental data can be converted into tables/graphs and statistical trends can be explained
Optimal layout plans can be proposed through area/volume calculations when designing animal housing spaces

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
